c:complexType.name: BarExtensionPoint
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The class of protovis Bar extension points.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: fillStyle
c:property.c:documentation:
The fill color of the bar.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: strokeStyle
c:property.c:documentation:
The border stroke color of the bar.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: lineWidth
c:property.c:documentation:
The width of the border of the bar.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: width
c:property.c:documentation:
The width of the bar.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: height
c:property.c:documentation:
The height of the bar.
See the associated protovis documentation at .
